pages.text:
Meet The Owners
Michael Hamwey
Michael Hamwey is a Naples-based entrepreneur with a passion for botanicals and the restaurant industry. Raised in a family that owned restaurants for over 30 years outside of Boston, he grew up immersed in the culinary world. Michael spent 13 years in the mortgage industry before relocating to Naples in 2020, where he discovered the wonders of Kava and botanical teas. He was immediately drawn to their unique flavors and natural healing properties. With his newfound passion for botanicals, Michael decided to partner with Chad Brunette in 2021 to bring these amazing products to more people through Kava Luv. With his extensive experience in business and the restaurant industry, Michael is dedicated to sharing his love for Kava and botanicals with the world.
Chad Brunette
Chad Brunette a Michigan native, relocated to Florida in 2011. In 2019, he was introduced to the world of kava, and quickly developed a passion for the industry. This led him to extensive research and ultimately the decision to establish his own kava bar. In March 2021, Chad opened the first Kava Luv location in Naples. When he's not focused on entrepreneurial endeavors, Chad enjoys exploring new destinations, delving into topics like history, philosophy, and science.

We are a locally owned kava bar with a relaxing, welcoming vibe. We serve house made cold brew, traditional tea and shell beverages.

events
The Concept
Experience the ultimate community gathering at Kava Luv's events. From Poker Night to Wellness Wednesday, we offer a range of unique events designed to bring people together and promote good vibes. Relax, unwind, and socialize with friends old and new while enjoying our selection of delicious drinks and snacks. Whether you're looking to connect with others or simply unwind after a long day, Kava Luv's events are the perfect way to do so. Come and join us for unforgettable nights and good vibes at Kava Luv.
Signature Events
Trivia Night
Think you’ve got what it takes to win
Trivia Night
? Join us every
Tuesday
at
Kava Luv Social Lounge
for an exciting night of
custom-made trivia
– no generic questions here!
Hosted weekly at
both locations
Multiple rounds with
prizes for each round
Gather your friends, grab a drink, and test your knowledge across a variety of fun and unique topics. Whether you’re a trivia buff or just in it for the laughs, there’s something for everyone.
Wellness Wednesday
Join us for
Wellness Wednesday
, a monthly event at
Kava Luv Social Lounge
where community and wellness come together! Hosted at our
Pine Ridge location
, this event showcases local small businesses offering
health and wellness products and services
.
Discover unique items like
IV treatments, candles, massages, wellness products
, and more while supporting small businesses dedicated to helping you feel your best.
When
: The first Wednesday of every month
Where
: Kava Luv Social Lounge, Pine Ridge
Whether you’re shopping for self-care or connecting with local entrepreneurs,
Wellness Wednesday
is your go-to event for community, connection, and well-being.
Support local. Build community. Find your balance.
Jackbox Night
Looking for the ultimate
game night in Naples, FL
? Join us every week at
Kava Luv Social Lounge
for our exciting
Jackbox Party Game Nights
!
Friday Nights
at our
Collier location
Saturday Nights
at our
Pine Ridge location
Grab your friends, sip on your favorite kava or botanical tea, and dive into hilarious
Jackbox games
that test your wit, creativity, and teamwork. All you need is your phone to play – no controllers required!
Whether you’re a trivia master, a quick-witted joker, or just here for the laughs,
Kava Luv Social Lounge
is your go-to spot for
fun, games, and community in Naples
.
